question: Name two notable lakes surrounding Trakai, Lithuania.
true_answer: Galvė Lake and Lukos Lake (also known as Bernardinų Lake).
asked_question_translated: Navedite dve pomembni jezeri v okolici mesta Trakai v Litvi.
answer: Dve pomembni jezeri v okolici mesta Trakai v Litvi sta jezero Galvė in jezero Luka.
answer_translated_eng: Two important lakes around Trakai, Lithuania, are Lake Galvė and Lake Luka.
